text: The DJ blew and was playing Spotify. Any person with a laptop can do that. Crowd was unpleasing and quite disgusting. If you have morals or dignity, I would suggest somewhere else.

Went for lunch and all I can say is HUGE portions! Food was good and very cheap for what you get.  I had the cheese steak sandwich and it definitely was no 'steak-um" sandwich, it was real chipped steak with plenty of cheese and fresh bread.
If zero stars were as option, that would be the choice here. Trash all trash. Apparently reverse racism is alive and well in this place.
